channel.title: CVE Feed for modalweb -- Advanced File Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for modalweb -- Advanced File Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-5598|2024-06-29T04:33:29.415Z -- modalweb -- advanced%20file%20manager
item.description: The Advanced File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 5.2.4 via the 'fma_local_file_system' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including backups or other sensitive information if the files have been moved to the built-in Trash folder.
